front.title: LMP, LDP and RSVP Extensions for Optical UNI Signaling

abstract.t: The Optical Interworking Forum (OIF) has defined extensions to theLink Management Protocol (LMP), the Label Distribution Protocol(LDP) and the Resource reServation Protocol (RSVP) for optical UserNetwork Interface (UNI) signaling. These extensions consist of a setof new messages and data objects. This draft describes theseextensions.
